channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Webinar Series: Microsoft Entra Suite Summer Camp
item.description: Catch up on our Microsoft Entra Suite Summer Camp, now available on demand, to learn how to unify identity and network access with the Microsoft Entra Suite. The Microsoft Entra Suite Summer Camp is your opportunity to explore what’s new across the Suite—including product updates we will be announcing that week—and see how to deploy them in real-world scenarios. Each session will highlight new features, live demos and an expert campfire Q&A to help you move from planning to deployment with ease. Whether you're looking to streamline employee lifecycle, secure access to on-prem and AI apps, or ...
